00023 #include "MethodInvoc.h"

00025 MethodInvoc::MethodInvoc() {

00033 MethodInvoc* _methinv_instance = NULL;
00034 
00035 void MethodInvoc::init()
00036 {
00037         if(_methinv_instance==NULL)
00038         {
00039                 _methinv_instance = new MethodInvoc();
00040                 _methinv_instance->running = false;
00041         }
00042 }
00043 void MethodInvoc::service(int fd)
00044 {
00045         init();
00046         string methInfo,retValue;
00047         _methinv_instance->getServer()->Receive(fd,methInfo,1024);
00048         methInfo =methInfo.substr(0,methInfo.find_last_of(">")+1);
00049         cout << methInfo << flush;
00050         try
00051         {
00052                 XmlParser parser("Parser");
00053                 if(methInfo.find("lang=\"c++\"")!=string::npos || methInfo.find("lang='c++'")!=string::npos)
00054                 {
00055                         Document doc = parser.getDocument(methInfo);
00056                         Element message = doc.getRootElement();
00057                         if(message.getTagName()!="method")
00058                         {
00059                                 throw new MethodInvokerException("No method Tag\n",retValue);
00060                         }
00061                         if(message.getAttributes().size()<3)
00062                         {
00063                                 throw new MethodInvokerException("name,class and lang are mandatory attributes\n",retValue);
00064                         }
00065                         else if(message.getAttribute("name")=="")
00066                         {
00067                                 throw new MethodInvokerException("name attribute missing\n",retValue);
00068                         }
00069                         else if(message.getAttribute("className")=="")
00070                         {
00071                                 throw new MethodInvokerException("class attribute missing\n",retValue);
00072                         }
00073                         else if(message.getAttribute("lang")=="")
00074                         {
00075                                 throw new MethodInvokerException("lang attribute missing\n",retValue);
00076                         }
00077                         if(message.getChildElements().size()!=1)
00078                         {
00079                                 throw new MethodInvokerException("message tag should have only one child tag\n",retValue);
00080                         }
00081                         else if(message.getChildElements().at(0).getTagName()!="args")
00082                         {
00083                                 throw new MethodInvokerException("message tag should have an args child tag\n",retValue);
00084                         }
00085                         Serialize ser;
00086                         Reflector reflector;
00087                         args argus;
00088                         vals valus;
00089                         ElementList argts = message.getChildElements().at(0).getChildElements();
00090                         for (unsigned var = 0; var < argts.size();  var++)
00091                         {
00092                                 void *value = NULL;
00093                                 Element arg = argts.at(var);
00094                                 if(arg.getTagName()!="argument" || arg.getAttribute("type")=="")
00095                                         throw new MethodInvokerException("every argument tag should have a name and type attribute\n",retValue);
00096                                 if(arg.getText()=="" && arg.getChildElements().size()==0)
00097                                         throw new MethodInvokerException("argument value missing\n",retValue);
00098                                 if(arg.getAttribute("type")=="int")
00099                                 {
00100                                         int *vt = new int;
00101                                         *vt = boost::lexical_cast<int>(arg.getText());
00102                                         value = vt;
00103                                 }
00104                                 else if(arg.getAttribute("type")=="float")
00105                                 {
00106                                         float *vt = new float;
00107                                         *vt = boost::lexical_cast<float>(arg.getText());
00108                                         value = vt;
00109                                 }
00110                                 else if(arg.getAttribute("type")=="double")
00111                                 {
00112                                         double *vt = new double;
00113                                         *vt = boost::lexical_cast<double>(arg.getText());
00114                                         value = vt;
00115                                 }
00116                                 else if(arg.getAttribute("type")=="string")
00117                                 {
00118                                         string *vt = new string;
00119                                         *vt = boost::lexical_cast<string>(arg.getText());
00120                                         value = vt;
00121                                 }
00122                                 else if(arg.getAttribute("type")!="")
00123                                 {
00124                                         Element obj = arg.getChildElements().at(0);
00125                                         string objxml = obj.render();
00126                                         string objClassName = obj.getTagName();
00127                                         value = ser.unSerializeUnknown(objxml,arg.getAttribute("type"));
00128                                 }
00129                                 argus.push_back(arg.getAttribute("type"));
00130                                 valus.push_back(value);
00131                         }
00132                         string className = message.getAttribute("className");
00133                         string returnType = message.getAttribute("returnType");
00134                         string lang = message.getAttribute("lang");
00135                         ClassInfo clas = reflector.getClassInfo(className);
00136                         string methodName = message.getAttribute("name");;
00137                         if(clas.getClassName()=="")
00138                         {
00139                                 throw new MethodInvokerException("class does not exist or is not in the library path\n",retValue);
00140                         }
00141                         Method meth = clas.getMethod(methodName,argus);
00142                         if(meth.getMethodName()=="")
00143                         {
00144                                 throw new MethodInvokerException("method does not exist for the class or the class does not exist in the library path\n",retValue);
00145                         }
00146                         else
00147                         {
00148                                 args argus;
00149                                 Constructor ctor = clas.getConstructor(argus);
00150                                 void *_temp = reflector.newInstanceGVP(ctor);
00151                                 if(returnType=="void" || returnType=="")
00152                                 {
00153                                         reflector.invokeMethod<void*>(_temp,meth,valus);
00154                                         retValue = ("<return:void></return:void>");
00155                                 }
00156                                 else
00157                                 {
00158                                         if(returnType=="int")
00159                                         {
00160                                                 int retv = reflector.invokeMethod<int>(_temp,meth,valus);
00161                                                 retValue = ("<return:int>"+boost::lexical_cast<string>(retv)+"</return:int>");
00162                                         }
00163                                         else if(returnType=="float")
00164                                         {
00165                                                 float retv = reflector.invokeMethod<float>(_temp,meth,valus);
00166                                                 retValue = ("<return:float>"+boost::lexical_cast<string>(retv)+"</return:float>");
00167                                         }
00168                                         else if(returnType=="double")
00169                                         {
00170                                                 double retv = reflector.invokeMethod<double>(_temp,meth,valus);
00171                                                 retValue = ("<return:double>"+boost::lexical_cast<string>(retv)+"</return:double>");
00172                                         }
00173                                         else if(returnType=="string")
00174                                         {
00175                                                 string retv = reflector.invokeMethod<string>(_temp,meth,valus);
00176                                                 retValue = ("<return:string>"+retv+"</return:string>");
00177                                         }
00178                                         else if(returnType!="")
00179                                         {
00180                                                 void* retobj = reflector.invokeMethodUnknownReturn(_temp,meth,valus);
00181                                                 string oxml = ser.serializeUnknown(retobj,returnType);
00182                                                 retValue = ("<return:"+returnType+">"+oxml+"</return:"+returnType+">");
00183                                         }
00184                                 }
00185 
00186                         }
00187                 }
00188                 else
00189                 {
00190                         retValue = "<return:exception>This is a C++ daemon</return:exception>";
00191                 }
00192                 if(retValue!="")
00193                         _methinv_instance->getServer()->Send(fd,retValue);
00194                 close(fd);
00195         }
00196         catch(MethodInvokerException *e)
00197         {
00198                 cout << e->getMessage() << flush;
00199                 _methinv_instance->getServer()->Send(fd,retValue);
00200                 close(fd);
00201         }
00202         catch(...)
00203         {
00204                 cout << "exception occurred" << flush;
00205                 retValue = ("<return:exception>XmlParseException occurred</return:exception>");
00206                 _methinv_instance->getServer()->Send(fd,retValue);
00207                 close(fd);
00208         }
00209 }
00210 
00211 
00212 void MethodInvoc::trigger(string port)
00213 {
00214         init();
00215         if(_methinv_instance->running)
00216                 return;
00217         _methinv_instance->setServer(new Server(port,false,500,&service,true));
00218         _methinv_instance->running = true;
00219         return;
00220 }
